title: Jonas Vingegaard Exceeds Expectations in Key TT Test to Stay Within Striking Distance at Tour de France
content:
Matteo Jorgenson roars to 7th while Van Aert loses nearly 2 minutes in warning ahead of Olympic Games: 'I hope for better legs during the Games.'

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard Exceeds Expectations in Key TT Test to Stay Within Striking Distance at Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
